column2: Slightly lethargic; ungroomed; sac'd due to tumor size and poor health. T1--located on right ear
DCT-TVA; Braf ca; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, heart, lungs, kidney, spleen, liver, tumor
Slightly lethargic; ungroomed; sac'd due to tumor size and poor health. T1--located on right ear
Tumor was very cystic - attempted to locate pieces for cryogenics in middle of tumor as much as possible.
Tumor invaded abdominal cavity and grew on top of heart. All other organs appeared normal.
